§ 6311. Regulations The Office of Personnel Management may prescribe regulations necessary for the administration of this subchapter. (Pub. L. 89–554, Sept. 6, 1966, 80 Stat. 521; Pub. L. 95–454, title IX, § 906(a)(2), Oct. 13, 1978, 92 Stat. 1224.)
